name: ALPAGES : THE FIVE BOOKS
description: RUN, ESCAPE, SHOOT, SURVIVE AND FIND THE 5 BOOKS ! An indie Arcade Horror Game.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS 7 + Processor: Dual Core Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Any Fx Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: You know a game's promising when they have to hack it to stay at 100% hp for the trailer  I bought this game just to point that out  Not quite sure if that supports them or no

This might be one of the worst games I have ever played, un fun, buggy, little options. Its just a slender clone with guns, luckily i didn't spend money on this and a friend gifted it to me as a joke. would not recomend at all, 1/10.
The developers have terrible grammar and the game itself has bug issues! Regardless of its cheap price it doesn't hold entertainment value.
